text:
The Team Of Simmba Reunited For A Success Bash And It Was Just Like The Film, A Blockbuster!
The Team Of Simmba Reunited For A Success Bash And It Was Just Like The Film, A Blockbuster!
What happens when two powerhouses of talent like Ranveer Singh and Rohit Shetty collaborate for a film?
You get a sure-shot blockbuster!
This whistle-worthy 'dhamaka' film has impressed the audience and breaking all box-office records. The film has entered the 200 crore club and is still going strong.
Viral Bhayani
To celebrate this big achievement, the team of Simmba reunited for a grand success bash and just like the film, the party too was a big blockbuster!
Viral Bhayani
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
The party was attended by the entire team of Simmba including Akshay Kumar, Ajay Devgn, Sonu Sood, Sara Ali Khan, Ranveer Singh, Rohit Shetty and a few others.
However, like always, all eyes were only on newlyweds Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. DP too attended the bash to support her husband and the pictures and videos that have made their way online prove that it was one entertaining night for the team!
title: The Team Of Simmba Reunited For A Success Bash And It Was Just Like The Film, A Blockbuster!
description: To celebrate this big achievement, the team of Simmba reunited for a grand success bash and just like the film, the party too was a big blockbuster! The party was attended by the entire team of Simmba including Akshay Kumar, Ajay Devgn, Sonu Sood, Sara Ali Khan, Ranveer Singh, Rohit Shetty and a few others.
